page.title: 12THE OTMOOR REVEIW
page.content: The Otmoor Reveiw is a type of Otmoor Newspaper. It is produced by our teacher and printed with a duplicator. It has things to do with the village life and stuff to buy. People put advertisements in it. The first page usually has a picture someone from our school has drawn. The next page is the church page. It is by Mr Wainwright.It has dates for services. Sometimes there are poems and things about the school. There are always nature notes which Mr Ushaw has written. In the village some women have formed a Village Institute and their news is there. Sometimes there are Councillor's notes about the local buildings in the village and other places around. Some of the children from our school deliver it. The Otmoor Reveiw is not a newspaper because it is only published once a month.
